plot: The guys hire Dee's friend as a promoter for the bar and get more than they bargained for. Charlie seeks black friends to prove he isn't a racist.

Dee introduces the guys to her friend, Terrell, from her acting class who offers to help promote their bar. The promotion is successful, with the catch that their clientèle is now gay men. Dennis' vanity leads him to enjoy the attention of the new customers, while Charlie strives to prove he's not a racist.—garyvent
